payload.message:
Daily AI automation news task.

**TOPICS TO SEARCH:**
1. OpenClaw
2. Antigravity (AI agent platform)
3. Claude/Anthropic
4. AI agent automation systems

**CHANNELS TO CHECK:**
- Julian Goldie SEO
- Alex Finn (@AlexFinnOfficial)
- Nate B Jones (@NateBJones)
- Matthew Berman
- Peter Yang

**FORMAT RULES:**
- Max 3 videos per channel (pick highest view count if more)
- For each video, include a 1-2 sentence ACTUAL SUMMARY of what the video covers based on transcript — not just the title
- Group by category (Claude/Anthropic, OpenClaw, AI Agents, etc.)
- Include channel status section at bottom

**EXAMPLE FORMAT:**
• "Video Title" - Channel Name (duration, time ago)
  ↳ Actual summary of content: what you learn, key takeaway, main point covered.

**COST OPTIMIZATION:**
- Use DeepSeek V3 for transcript summarization (bulk text work)
- Use Claude only for orchestration, formatting final output, and delivery

**DELIVERY:**
Send compiled brief to Cody via Telegram. If no new relevant videos found, send short 'no new videos today' message.
Run your nightly health check now. Execute all 7 checks as defined in your AGENTS.md brain prompt, compile the report, and deliver it to Slack #sentinel. If status is CRITICAL, also alert #archer.
